bibl.title: Private Letter about Criminals in the Desert. P. Prag. Wessely Gr. inv. II 294 verso.

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.note: Inv. II 294 recto. Letter from the strategos of the Athribite nome to the strategos of the Bubastite. 179-181 A.D. - Inv. II 294 verso. Private letter. Provenance unknown (Delta or Middle Egypt?), last decades of the second century A.D. - Both texts will appear in due course in P. Prag. IV.

bibl.title: Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Wessely Pragenses Inv. Gr. II 294 recto; II 294 verso
WHITEHORNE John E.G., Private Letter about Criminals in the Desert. P. Prag. Wessely Gr. inv. II 294 verso.

Bernhard PALME (Hg.), Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001 = Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia. 1 (Wien, 2007) pp. 739-742.

Inv. II 294 recto. Letter from the strategos of the Athribite nome to the strategos of the Bubastite. 179-181 A.D. - Inv. II 294 verso. Private letter. Provenance unknown (Delta or Middle Egypt?), last decades of the second century A.D. - Both texts will appear in due course in P. Prag. IV.
